results.content:
This hospital management system is the best course i have ever taken on udemy. Why do l said so?


1. The instructor promise to start from simple to complex and 
    that is exactly what he did. He made complex concepts in 
    codeigniter very easily for us the student. I bet you when 
    you are able to finish this course you can use the 
    knowledge to create any erp software of your own.



2.  When a student have problem he is always available to 
     help. He  has even given us his whatsapp phone number 
     to chat him if any problem to make the learning even more 
     easier.
  



3.  When a student have problems and can't find his or her 
    way around it inspite the Instructor's  help on udemy , the 
  Instructor request his Teamviewer ID and PASSWORD AND he codes with him or her live with Teamviewer to solve the problem. I personally have been hepled through Teamviewer alot.



This  course is worth over $1000 . You may not agree with me now, but l bet you when you finish this course, you will agree with me.
